Header.title: Preventable hospitalisations are up to 3Ã— higher in remote areas of Australia
Header.paragraph: Promoting health literacy, providing mentoring, and fostering educational development in regional and remote areas.

About.paragraph: WellnessED is a not-for-profit group dedicated to improving health literacy and outcomes across Australia. We take a 'ground-up' approach to healthcare; with health education, personal mentoring, and developing sustainable educational structures. Our goal is to dispell common health myths and replace 'word-of-mouth' with thoroughly validated and well-researched knowledge.
Why: Provide a wide range of courses on healthy living
Online courses available to reach remote schools
Why2: Tailored content and delivery for all ages K-12

Courses.name: Critical Evaluation of Healthcare in Media
